task.title: How to multiply numbers
task.shortdesc: Here you will find instructions about using the multiplication feature of calculator application.

taskbody.prereq: To successfully multiply numbers, you must know what is multiplication.
taskbody.result: The result from multiplication is displayed.
taskbody.example:
You want to multiply 2 with 3. The equation will look like 3*2=6. You enter 3. Press star button. Enter 2. Press equals button.
The result 6 appears on the screen.
